alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN VALENCIA, SOUTH CENTRAL SANDOVAL AND BERNALILLO COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM MDT... At 829 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern Albuquerque, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albuquerque, southwestern Rio Rancho, Corrales, Los Ranchos De Albuquerque, Cabezon, Isleta Pueblo, Paradise Hills, South Valley, Sandia Heights and North Valley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 141 and 169. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 210 and 236. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
